channel.title: University on Sergio Méndez Website
channel.description: Recent content in University on Sergio Méndez Website

item.title: On the way to KCD Antigua Guatemala 2025, Cloud Native Guatemala
item.description: Two weeks before KCD Antigua Guatemala we hosted a meetup to to provide more details about the event and discuss the national and international speakers who will be attending. Event

item.title: Kubernetes Projects at the University, Cloud Native Guatemala
item.description: This time we hosted a meetup to share university projects that are using Kubernetes at the University of San Carlos de Guatemala. Event
